mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.kehu_name as kehuName ,a.kehu_phone as kehuPhone ,a.kehu_id_number as kehuIdNumber ,a.kehu_photo as kehuPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM kehu a
and a.kehu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuName},'%')
and a.kehu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuPhone},'%')
and a.kehu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
